message: I have a great product that I think you'll really like. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I appreciate the offer, but $120 is a bit too high for me.  I'd be willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a good deal, but $90 is a bit low for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway at $110.
I appreciate you coming down a bit, but $110 is still a bit out of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $105,  which is the absolute max I can offer.
I appreciate your willingness to go up to $105, but I'm still a bit short of my target. I'm willing to meet you at $115, which is the lowest I can go.
